      • getLogEntry

        public SimplePageLogEntry getLogEntry(String userId,
                             long itemId,
                             Long studentPageId)
        Description copied from interface: SimplePageToolDao
        studentPageId is only to be used if it is a student-made page. It corresponds to the pageId found in either lesson_builder_student_pages or lesson_builder_pages. There should only be one log entry for each combination.
        Specified by:
        getLogEntry in interface SimplePageToolDao
